Tennessee State Board of Education Policy Manual

strong.class: hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl pull-left site_sub_title
text-center visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl site_sub_title

div.class: makeTableResponsive img-responsive content-color well no-border col-md-12 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-push-0

p.b: Following guidance from Governor Bill Lee our school system will remain closed for the remainder of this school year. Our faculty and staff will continue to work with our students and families to provide support in all areas. We plan to continue providing meals on Mondays from 9 a.m. to 11 a.m. at Westwood Elementary School. Our teachers have been working with our families and students and will continue to do this. We will provide academic support online as well as through take home packets. We are developing a plan for your students to retrieve their personal belongings and also to give them an opportunity to return items to school. That plan will be communicated later in May. We will provide more details as they become available to us. We appreciate your understanding and your support. Stay well and thank you for being such an important part of our community and for taking care of your kids.

strong.span: Additional information will be posted on local media, social media, and the district website.

div.p: Siguiendo la guía del gobernador Bill Lee, nuestro sistema escolar permanecerá cerrado por el resto de este año escolar. Nuestra facultad y el personal continuarán trabajando con nuestros estudiantes y familias para brindar apoyo en todas las áreas. Planeamos continuar proporcionando comidas los lunes de 9 a.m. a 11 a.m. en la Escuela Primaria Westwood. Nuestros maestros han estado trabajando con nuestras familias y estudiantes y continuarán haciéndolo. Brindaremos apoyo académico en línea, así como a través de paquetes para llevar a casa. Estamos desarrollando un plan para que sus estudiantes recuperen sus pertenencias personales y también para darles la oportunidad de devolver los artículos a la escuela. Ese plan se comunicará más adelante en mayo. Proporcionaremos más detalles a medida que estén disponibles para nosotros. Agradecemos su comprensión y su apoyo. Manténgase bien y gracias por ser una parte tan importante de nuestra comunidad y por cuidar a sus hijos.

div.class: col-lg-4 hidden-xs hidden-sm hidden-md visible-lg visible-xl

div.p:
Every Child,
Every Day.
Our Kids,
Our Future.
